name: Mango and Coconut Milk Batida
description: Batidas are a family of cocktails that feature the Brazilian spirit Cachaça, which is made from fresh sugar cane juice that is fermented and distilled. This version uses mango juice, coconut milk, plus a little lime juice and agave to round things out.
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons freshly squeezed lime juice from 1 lime

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cachaça, mango juice, coconut milk, lime, and agave nectar in a large cocktail shaker. Fill the cocktail shaker with ice and shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into two ice-filled highball glasses and serve immediately.
